headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Halloween is Coming to Los Santos
content:
In the weeks ahead, don frightening new Masks, escape the clutches of the extraterrestrial, hunt down apparitions, enjoy discounts on all manner of disguises, costumes and Outfits, and more.

Plus, return to North Yankton — for the first time in GTA Online — to dispatch the marching tides of undead in a new Community Challenge available for a limited time.
